Old age home registration: Social Welfare Department-à®•à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿ - unregistered homes-à® report à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®²à®¾à®®à¯. Elder helpline: 14567. Documentation: Photos, medical reports, witness statements.

samples.instruction: Rental agreement-la ennenna details irukkanum?
samples.current_output: Owner & tenant peru, address, Aadhaar number, monthly rent amount, advance/deposit amount, agreement period, maintenance yaar responsibility, notice period, house condition, restrictions (pets, subletting), electricity/water yaar pay panrathu - ellaam irukkanum.

samples.instruction: Online-la rental agreement register panna mudiyuma?
samples.current_output: Aama. TNREGINET (tnreginet.gov.in) moolam online-la document draft seydhu, e-stamp vaangi, appointment book panni Sub-Registrar office-la biometric verification seyyalam. Fully online illa - physical visit venum.

samples.instruction: Job fraud - advance à®µà®¾à®™à¯à®•à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯ à®®à¯‹à®šà®®à¯ à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®¾à®™à¯à®•
samples.current_output: Complaint: 1) cybercrime.gov.in, 2) Local police FIR, 3) Labour Department (if company involved). Legal sections: IT Act 66D (cheating using computer), IPC 420 (cheating). Red flags: Advance fee, unrealistic salary, gmail/yahoo recruiter. Legitimate companies never ask money.

samples.instruction: Motor Accident Claim à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ file à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: File at: Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT) - District Court. Documents: FIR, medical records, bills, death certificate (if applicable), income proof, insurance details. Time limit: No strict limit (reasonable time). Lawyer not mandatory. Lok Adalat-à®²à¯à®®à¯ settle à®†à®•à®²à®¾à®®à¯.

samples.instruction: à®µà¯€à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®¿à®²à¯ repair à®µà¯‡à®²à¯ˆ à®¯à®¾à®°à¯ à®ªà¯Šà®±à¯à®ªà¯à®ªà¯?
samples.current_output: Major repairs (roof leak, plumbing main line, electrical wiring, structural issues) - Owner à®ªà¯Šà®±à¯à®ªà¯à®ªà¯. Minor repairs (tap washer, bulb, fuse) - Tenant à®ªà¯Šà®±à¯à®ªà¯à®ªà¯. Agreement-à®²à¯ clearly mention à®‡à®°à¯à®•à¯à®•à®£à¯à®®à¯. Owner refuse à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®¿à®©à®¾à®²à¯ rent-à®²à¯ à®‡à®°à¯à®¨à¯à®¤à¯ deduct à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®¯à®²à®¾à®®à¯ (with notice).

samples.instruction: DV case-à®²à¯ à®à®©à¯à®© relief à®•à®¿à®Ÿà¯ˆà®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output: Reliefs under DV Act: 1) Protection order (abuse stop), 2) Residence order (shared household-à®²à¯ stay), 3) Monetary relief (maintenance, medical, compensation), 4) Custody order, 5) Compensation. Ex-parte order (urgent) 2-3 days-à®²à¯ à®•à®¿à®Ÿà¯ˆà®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯.

samples.instruction: En pulla school-la adicchittaanga, action edukkanum (Madurai style)
samples.current_output: Corporal punishment banned! RTE Act + NCPCR guidelines. Actions: 1) School principal-kitta written complaint, 2) Education Department (DEO), 3) Child Welfare Committee, 4) Police (if serious injury). Evidence: Photos, medical certificate. Teacher action: Suspension, termination possible. School license: Risk of cancellation. Child helpline: 1098.

samples.instruction: OTP share panni money pochu - thirumba kidaikkumaa?
samples.current_output: Bank approach: RBI circular-padi, unauthorized transaction-kku customer negligence irundhaalum limited liability (Rs.25,000 max). Aanaal OTP voluntary share = customer liability higher. 3 days-kkul report pannunga. Banking Ombudsman appeal undu.

samples.instruction: IT company-à®²à¯ bond sign à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®¿à®©à¯‡à®©à¯ - valid-à®†?
samples.current_output: Training bond: Valid if genuine training provided. Employment bond (2-3 years): Generally unenforceable - Indian Contract Act under 'restraint of trade'. Reasonable training cost recovery: May be valid. Exorbitant penalty: Not enforceable. Consult lawyer before paying.

samples.instruction: Ennoda paiyyanai police pidichitaanga, enna panradhu? (Madurai style)
samples.current_output: Panic aagaadheenga. First: enna case-la arrest-nnu kelunga. Bailable-nna station-layae bail kidaikkum. Non-bailable-nna lawyer-kitta ponga. 24 hours-la court-la produce pannanum - adhu rights. Lawyer helpline: DLSA, 15100.

samples.instruction: Wedding hall booking cancel, advance thirumba tharala, legal action?
samples.current_output: Depends on: 1) Cancellation policy in agreement, 2) How early cancelled, 3) Reason for cancellation. Rights: 1) Unreasonable forfeiture = challenge pannalam, 2) Hall's fault (double booking, not available) = full refund + compensation, 3) Consumer Forum: Unfair trade practice claim. Force majeure (COVID type): Special consideration. Always get cancellation policy in writing!

samples.instruction: Duplicate RC à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®ªà¯†à®±à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) FIR (if lost/stolen), 2) Form 26 fill, 3) Affidavit, 4) Newspaper advertisement, 5) RTO application + fee. Documents: ID proof, address proof, insurance, PUC. Time: 15-30 days. Fee: Rs.300-500 + penalties if applicable.

samples.instruction: Social media-à®²à¯ abuse/trolling - complaint à®ªà¯‹à®Ÿà®²à®¾à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: à®†à®®à¯. Sections: IT Act 66A (struck down but alternatives exist), 67 (obscene content), IPC 509 (insult to modesty), 506 (criminal intimidation), 507 (criminal intimidation by anonymous). Platform report + cybercrime.gov.in complaint. Women: 181 helpline.

samples.instruction: Important helpline numbers à®à®©à¯à®©à¯†à®©à¯à®©?
samples.current_output: Emergency: 112. Police: 100. Fire: 101. Ambulance: 108. Women helpline: 181, 1091. Child helpline: 1098. Cyber crime: 1930. Consumer: 1800-11-4000. Senior citizen: 14567. Anti-corruption: 1064. CM helpline: 1100. Railway: 139.

samples.instruction: Kadaikkaaran mosamaana saamaan kuduthuttan, enna panradhu? (Chennai casual)
samples.current_output: Bill irukkaa paarunga. Bill irundhaa exchange/refund kelunga. Refuse pannaa Consumer helpline-la call pannunga - 1800-11-4000. WhatsApp-la complaint: 8800001915. Simple-aa solve aagum.

samples.instruction: Consumer forum-la case file seyya ennenna documents venum?
samples.current_output: Required: 1) Written complaint (5 copies), 2) Bill/Invoice copy, 3) Warranty/Guarantee card, 4) Correspondence with seller (letters, emails), 5) ID proof, 6) Address proof, 7) Photos/Videos of defect. Online filing: edaakhil.nic.in portal moolam.

samples.instruction: Apartment Association-la enna rights irukku?
samples.current_output: TN Apartment Ownership Act padi: 1) AGM-la vote seyya, 2) Committee member aaga, 3) Accounts inspect seyya, 4) Common area use seyya, 5) Decisions-la participate. Arbitrary rules-kku object seyyalam. Discrimination-kku legal action edukkalam.

samples.instruction: Road accident-la enna seyyanum?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Injured-kku first aid, 2) 108 ambulance call, 3) Police 100 call, 4) Photos/videos edunga, 5) Witness details collect, 6) FIR file (or police will file). Good Samaritan law: Help pannuravarkalukku legal protection undu.

samples.instruction: False FIR pottaal enna aagum?
samples.current_output: IPC 182 (BNS 213): False information to public servant - 6 months imprisonment + fine. IPC 211 (BNS 248): False charge with intent to injure - 2-7 years imprisonment. Defamation case-um varum. Accused can file counter case. Think twice before filing.

samples.instruction: Expired product vitraal enna complaint seyyalam?
samples.current_output: FSSAI complaint: fssai.gov.in or Food Safety Officer (District)-kku. Consumer forum-la compensation case. Police complaint (IPC 273 - selling adulterated food). Seller-kku fine + license cancellation aagalam. Product, bill vaichirunga.

samples.current_output: Bank approach: RBI circular-à®ªà®Ÿà®¿, unauthorized transaction-à®•à¯à®•à¯ customer negligence à®‡à®°à¯à®¨à¯à®¤à®¾à®²à¯à®®à¯ limited liability (Rs.25,000 max). à®†à®©à®¾à®²à¯ OTP voluntary share = customer liability higher. 3 days-à®•à¯à®•à¯à®³à¯ report à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®™à¯à®•. Banking Ombudsman appeal à®‰à®£à¯à®Ÿà¯.

samples.instruction: Power of Attorney à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Types: General (all acts), Special (specific act). Draft on stamp paper (Rs.100-500 based on state). Registration: Sub-Registrar office (optional but recommended for property). NRI: Indian Embassy attestation. Revocation: Same process + inform parties.

samples.instruction: Birth certificate à®‡à®²à¯à®²à¯ˆ - late registration à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿?
samples.current_output: Within 1 year: Normal fee at Registrar. 1-5 years: Late fee + affidavit. 5+ years: Court order required (Magistrate). Apply: Corporation/Municipality/Panchayat. Documents: Hospital records, school records, affidavit, ID proofs of parents. TN: e-Sevai centre-à®²à¯à®®à¯ available.
